title: Sweet Potato Pie Make-Ahead Storage

items.name: Make-ahead timing
items.details: Can be baked 2 days before serving (e.g., Tuesday night before Thanksgiving). Flavors often deepen over time.

items.name: Cooling
items.details: Let the pie cool completely at room temperature after baking to prevent condensation when wrapping.

items.name: Wrapping
items.details: Cover tightly with plastic wrap or foil, or store in an airtight container.

items.name: Refrigeration
items.details: Sweet potato pie lasts 3-4 days when properly refrigerated.

items.name: Reheating
items.details: Serve cold, at room temperature, or warm gently in the oven at 300F for 10-15 minutes to refresh.

notes: Sweet potato pie is an ideal make-ahead Thanksgiving dish.
